verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> <WH8798> thy face <WH6440> against mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against it,

And say <WH559> <WH8804> unto it, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, O mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, I am against thee, and I will stretch out <WH5186> <WH8804> mine hand <WH3027> against thee, and I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> thee most <WH4923> desolate <WH8077>.
I will lay <WH7760> <WH8799> thy cities <WH5892> waste <WH2723>, and thou shalt be desolate <WH8077>, and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

Because thou hast had a perpetual <WH5769> hatred <WH342>, and hast shed <WH5064> <WH8686> the blood of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> by the force <WH3027> of the sword <WH2719> in the time <WH6256> of their calamity <WH343>, in the time <WH6256> that their iniquity <WH5771> had an end <WH7093>:

Therefore, as I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, I will prepare <WH6213> <WH8799> thee unto blood <WH1818>, and blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> <WH8799> thee: sith <WH518> thou hast not hated <WH8130> <WH8804> blood <WH1818>, even blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> <WH8799> thee.

Thus will I make <WH5414> <WH8804> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> most <WH8077> desolate <WH8077>, and cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> from it him that passeht out <WH5674> <WH8802> and him that returneth <WH7725> <WH8802>.

And I will fill <WH4390> <WH8765> his mountains <WH2022> with his slain <WH2491> men: in thy hills <WH1389>, and in thy valleys <WH1516>, and in all thy rivers <WH650>, shall they fall <WH5307> <WH8799> that are slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>.

I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> thee perpetual <WH5769> desolations <WH8077>, and thy cities <WH5892> shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH3427> <WH8799>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

Because thou hast said <WH559> <WH8800>, These two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> and these two <WH8147> countries <WH776> shall be mine, and we will possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it; whereas the YY <WH3068> was there:

Therefore, as I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, I will even do <WH6213> <WH8804> according to thine anger <WH639>, and according to thine envy <WH7068> which thou hast used <WH6213> <WH8804> out of thy hatred <WH8135> against them; and I will make myself known <WH3045> <WH8738> among them, when I have judged <WH8199> <WH8799> thee.

And thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, and that I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> all thy blasphemies <WH5007> which thou hast spoken <WH559> <WH8804> against the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, They are laid desolate <WH8074> <WH8804> <WH8675> <WH8077>, they are given <WH5414> <WH8738> us to consume <WH402>.
Thus with your mouth <WH6310> ye have boasted <WH1431> <WH8686> against me, and have multiplied <WH6280> <WH8689> your words <WH1697> against me: I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> them.
Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; When the whole earth <WH776> rejoiceth <WH8055> <WH8800>, I will make <WH6213> <WH8799> thee desolate <WH8077>.

As thou didst rejoice <WH8057> at the inheritance <WH5159> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, because it was desolate <WH8074> <WH8804>, so will I do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee: thou shalt be desolate <WH8077>, O mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and all Idumea <WH123>, even all of it: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
